name: Donut Delivery
description:
Yeah uhh…

I've never made a game before but figured I would give this game jam a shot. It's obviously not finished but at least it's playable :)

Controls:

movement: up, left, and right arrow keys

donut throwing: down key (I couldn't figure out how to do it correctly)

Credits:

All assets were made by me in the 72 hour time period with the programs:

- Adobe Photoshop CC

- BeepBox

- Godot Engine 3.2

thanks for playing :))
